author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.1: metudes miltse,      þeah þe he modcearig
text.4: wadan wræclastas.      Wyrd bið ful ared!
text.8: mine ceare cwiþan.      Nis nu cwicra nan
text.9: þe ic him modsefan      minne durre
text.10: sweotule asecgan.      Ic to soþe wat
text.11: þæt biþ in eorle      indryhten þeaw,
text.12: þæt he his ferðlocan      fæste binde,
text.13: healde his hordcofan,      hycge swa he wille.
text.14: Ne mæg werig mod      wyrde wiðstondan,
text.15: ne se hreo hyge      helpe gefremman.
text.22: hrusan heolstre biwrah,      ond ic hean þonan
text.25: hwær ic feor oþþe neah      findan meahte
text.26: þone þe in meoduhealle      min mine wisse,
text.28: weman mid wynnum.      Wat se þe cunnað,
text.29: hu sliþen bið      sorg to geferan,
text.30: þam þe him lyt hafað      leofra geholena.
text.31: Warað hine wræclast,      nales wunden gold,
text.34: hu hine on geoguðe      his goldwine
text.35: wenede to wiste.      Wyn eal gedreas!
text.36: Forþon wat se þe sceal      his winedryhtnes
text.38: ðonne sorg ond slæp      somod ætgædre
text.40: þinceð him on mode      þæt he his mondryhten
text.41: clyppe ond cysse,      ond on cneo lecge
text.42: honda ond heafod,      swa he hwilum ær
text.47: hreosan hrim ond snaw,      hagle gemenged.
text.48: þonne beoð þy hefigran      heortan benne,
text.49: sare æfter swæsne.      Sorg bið geniwad,
text.53: Fleotendra ferð      no þær fela bringeð
text.55: þam þe sendan sceal      swiþe geneahhe
text.57: Forþon ic geþencan ne mæg      geond þas woruld
text.59: þonne ic eorla lif      eal geondþence,
text.62: ealra dogra gehwam      dreoseð ond fealleþ,
text.63: forþon ne mæg weorþan wis      wer, ær he age
text.64: wintra dæl in woruldrice.      Wita sceal geþyldig,
text.65: ne sceal no to hatheort      ne to hrædwyrde,
text.66: ne to wac wiga      ne to wanhydig,
text.67: ne to forht ne to fægen,      ne to feohgifre
text.68: ne næfre gielpes to georn,      ær he geare cunne.
text.69: Beorn sceal gebidan,      þonne he beot spriceð,
text.72: Ongietan sceal gleaw hæle      hu gæstlic bið,
text.73: þonne ealre þisse worulde wela      weste stondeð,
text.74: swa nu missenlice      geond þisne middangeard
text.79: wlonc bi wealle.      Sume wig fornom,
text.80: ferede in forðwege,      sumne fugel oþbær
text.81: ofer heanne holm,      sumne se hara wulf
text.84: Yþde swa þisne eardgeard      ælda scyppend
text.87: Se þonne þisne wealsteal      wise geþohte
text.89: frod in ferðe,      feor oft gemon
text.90: wælsleahta worn,      ond þas word acwið:
text.91: "Hwær cwom mearg? Hwær cwom mago?      Hwær cwom maþþumgyfa?
text.92: Hwær cwom symbla gesetu?      Hwær sindon seledreamas?
text.94: Eala þeodnes þrym!      Hu seo þrag gewat,
text.95: genap under nihthelm,      swa heo no wære.
text.96: Stondeð nu on laste      leofre duguþe
text.106: onwendeð wyrda gesceaft      weoruld under heofonum.
text.107: Her bið feoh læne,      her bið freond læne,
text.108: her bið mon læne,      her bið mæg læne,
text.109: eal þis eorþan gesteal      idel weorþeð!"
text.110: Swa cwæð snottor on mode,      gesæt him sundor æt rune.
text.111: Til biþ se þe his treowe gehealdeþ,      ne sceal næfre his torn to rycene
text.112: beorn of his breostum acyþan,      nemþe he ær þa bote cunne,
text.113: eorl mid elne gefremman.      Wel bið þam þe him are seceð,
text.114: frofre to fæder on heofonum,      þær us eal seo fæstnung stondeð.
